entities.name: gaunt
entities.description: Gaunt is described as speaking aggressively and making a claim of private property. He is also referred to as 'Mr Gaunt' which suggests he is an adult male.

entities.name: ogden
entities.description: Ogden is described as being on the receiving end of Gaunt's aggression and is referred to as 'man'. He is also shown to be able to cast spells.

entities.name: morfin
entities.description: Morfin is mentioned by Gaunt as his son. He is instructed by Gaunt to get in the house and not argue.

relationships.description: Gaunt is being aggressive towards Ogden, as evidenced by his tone and language. He also accuses Ogden of being an 'intruder'.
Gaunt refers to Morfin as his son, establishing a parent-child relationship between the two.
Ogden is also being aggressive towards Gaunt, as evidenced by his tone and language.
